name: Steam Works Video Game
blurb: Steam Works is an open world RPG where YOU decide the fate of human and alien kind! Set on the distant planet of Arcadia!

rewards.reward: No Reward

5...5 DOLLAR...5 DOLLAR SHOUT OOOUT!                                                                                                                                                                \r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou will receive a shout out on Twitter and Facebook.  You will also receive limited edition Steam Works wallpaper!

UPDATED TIER FOR PC! \r\nTHE ARCADIAN!<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>> EARLY BIRD SPECIAL!! Digital Downloadable copy of Steam Works for XBOX1, XBOX360 PS4 or PC. This limited price point is only available for the first backers of Steam Works.

THE REGAL ARCADIAN! \r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nDigital Downloadable copy of Steam Works for Xbox 360, XBOX1 and PS4 in all its glory and splendor!!  You also receive a shout out on Twitter, Facebook and the limited edition Steam Works Wallpaper Art. This price is only available to Kickstarter backers.

Alien Smalien!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou will receive a Digital Downloadable Copy of the Steam Works Strategy Guide!  Plus the Digital Downloadable copy of Steam Works for XBOX1, XBOX 360, or PS4 and a shout out on Twitter, Facebook, and the limited edition Steam Works Wallpaper Art. You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

TREASURE HUNTER\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nFor all you treasure seekers out there you will receive $5000 gold in game money. All previous tiers plus the Digital Downloadable Copy of the Steam Works Strategy Guide along with the Digital Downloadable Copy of Steam Works for XBOX1, XBOX 360, or PS4.  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

ARCADIA FOREVER!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nHard copy boxed version of Steam Works the game for XBOX1, XBOX 360 and PS4!!  The boxed copy includes user manual, map poster, and the game.  Show it off at dinner to your family.  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

DOUBLE BARREL DELIGHT!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou will receive a Code for a one of a kind shotgun called " The Kickstarter."  The gun is a double barrel pneumatic drum-fed automatic shotgun with a sword on the end. The kickstarter will level up with your character throughout the game. It will be your boon companion.  Equip it and slice and dice your way through the bandit scum of Arcadia.  Plus a team member will produce a VINE dancing and singing your name.  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

THESE BOOTS WERE MADE FOR ROCKIN'\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou will receive custom kickstarter in game leather boots that add plus +20 to your carrying capacity.  In addition you get the Rockin' audio CD and DRM-Free digital soundtrack. Put on your boots, roam around, while listening to the funky fresh rhymes of Arcadia!  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

PLAY THE GAME IN THE GAME GAME!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou will receive the Dead Man's Hand Card Game.  Dead Man's Hand is the card game of choice for the roughnecks of Arcadia.  You can gamble it up with Oil Men of Seraphim, Yellow Skulls, or in the comfort of your own home.  For up to 6 players, cards and dice are included.  Also Digitial Downloadable Concept Art sketchbook with printable JPEGS.  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

THE TRUE ARCADIAN!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou will receive a Kickstarter only Box Set for Xbox 360,  XBOX1 or PS4!  A special treat just for our backers.  The set comes in a custom collectors cigar box with foam inserts with room for the playing cards and dice, a fold out character schematic of the HG-921-66\\79 STEAM ROBOT.  It also contains a cloth map of Arcadia!! You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

A PUGILISTIC ENDEAVOR!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou get your name on Masterson Chesterbauchs' wall of boxing legends.  This is a gold name plate on the wall of the underground boxing club. Bruises heal, chicks dig scars, but glory last forever!!  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

A PICTURE IS WORTH A THOUSAND THANK YOU'S!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou will receive an Illustrated Sketchbook from the game.  This will include all the concept artwork from the game such as schematics, character sketches, vehicles, locations, skyships, etc.  You will also see your name in a special thank you section of the end credits.  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

YOU'LL SHOOT YOUR EYE OUT KID!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou get a one of a kind Steam Works gun prop.  These are handmade at Red Gears Studios. These guns were used in the live action trailers. These are limited in quantity so act fast to get your favorite characters gun!!  You will also receive all previous tier rewards.

HATS OFF TO YA!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou get a custom made mini top-hat.  This hat comes complete with classic steampunk flair.  These are one of a kind original special edition 1-50. They were created by our very own master costume designer. For the males a custom eye patch or monocle.  These will also be a one of a kind special edition.  You will also receive all previous tier rewards while supplies last.

HERE'S LOOKING AT YOU KID!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou will get a rare, one of a kind, once in a lifetime never going to see it ever again self portrait as YOU, drawn as a Sky Pirate, in game concept art form.  Whew!  That was tough to say.  It will be sent to you digitally and physically.  These will be signed and numbered by our wonderfully talented concept artist M. Joshua Todd. You will also get 5 extra prints to give out to your friends and family.  At this level you also receive 2 extra Digital Downloadable copies of Steam Works. You will also receive all previous tier rewards while supplies last.

ORVILLE & WILBURS ENVY!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou get to build and equip your own custom skyship.  Name it, paint it, put grappling hooks on it, cannons, whatever you need. It also comes with your very own crew including flying sabotaging midgets.  Sky Pirates don't stand a chance against you and your scurvy crew.  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

SHIPS AHOY!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou get a 15 inch 3-D model of YOUR customized ship.  Yes the one YOU built and designed and equipped.  You can paint it, put it in a fairly large bottle, take it in the tub with you...whatever you do with a 15 inch ship.  You will also receive 5 extra Digital Downloadable copies of Steam Works to give to your friends or enemies (who will then become your friends).  Plus all previous rewards tiers while supplies last.

WHO'S THAT...ME??\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nWe will recreate your likeness in the game. You, yes YOU, your face will be in the game!!  You will be a NPC roaming the city or desert.  Be sure to find yourself.  You will also receive all previous tier rewards while supplies last.

CREATURE FEATURE!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou get to design a desert creature or alien that will be featured in the game. It can have horns, teeth, teeth horns, eight mouths, twenty seven eyes, or whatever you think is awesome (within reason).  Try to keep it clean people. Go head to head with your   master creation!!  You will also get the 3-D model video of the design process plus a small picture book.  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last, except for the "Who's that...Me??" Tier.

IS THAT A GUN IN YOUR POCKET...OR ARE YOU JUST HAPPY TO SHOOT ME?\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou get to design a one of a kind gun because you designed it.  It can be anything within the lore of our game.  It can be steampunk or alien.  It can be a shotgun or a cross-bow or a rocket launcher.  It can fire explosive rounds, or ten rounds at a time.  It can fire an octopus.  You can literally shoot an octopus with an octopus (there is an octopus in the game).  You get the picture.  The gun will be available in game for everyone to use and for them to find.  But YOU will get a code to download your weapon so that you can use it immediately.  You can even name it!! (within reason).  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last except for the "Who's That..Me?" and "Creature Feature".

CALVIN INCLINED TO WEAR THIS!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou get One Choice from the $1000 tiers (Who's That..Me?, "Creature Feature", or "Is that a gun in your pocket or are you just happy to shoot me?".  You will also receive an official game designed wearable wrist communicator. This is made of 100% genuine leather.  It is designed by the amazing and talented M.Joshua Todd, and it is a replica of the one used in the game menu system.  You can wear it wherever you want, wear it to the mall, wear it in the shower, wear it to the beach (watch out for sharks).  You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last.

ITTY BITTY CITY COMMITEE!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nYou get to design an ENTIRE bandit town!!  Full of bandits for YOU to fight.  You can design either a bunch of buildings, one giant building, a cave with rooms, or a hole in the desert.  It is ENTIRELY YOURS to do with what you will.  You will also get a CERTIFICATE OF DEED to your town.  You can NAME the town and you get a mini digital sketchbook on the process of creating your town.   You will also receive all previous reward tiers while supplies last and your choice of one of the three $1000 tiers.

WHAD'YA SAY??\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nEARLY BIRD SPECIAL!!  It's YOUR voice we hear in our game...You get to do a voice over in our game!!!  You get to be a character in Steam Works.  Fly to our studio in sunny Florida hang out with us for the whole weekend and we will have you being a voice over Pro in no time!!  (Travel is not included).  You will also receive all previous reward tiers.

WHAD'YA SAY...WHEN THE EARLY BIRD SPECIAL RUNS OUT!!!\r\n<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>\r\nSame as the $5000 level, only with your travel paid for!!  Stay in Sunny Florida for a weekend of fun, and voice a major part in the video game!!  You will receive voice over credit AND a producer's credit.  AWESOME!!!!

"THINGS GOT OUT OF CONTROL AND, UH... WE LOST DOUG" 
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
You get it all!!! Everything...AND you will go with us to DragonCon or the San Diego ComicCon...Ride in our limo, Hang out at the booth, Go to all the crazy after parties......and Rock-Out in general!!!
There will only be two slots for this level...so get in while you can.
